LanguageData.MSMetasis_Vial.label: Metasis Vial
LanguageData.MSMetasis_Vial.description: Metasis Chemical. Combine with an injector unit to make Metasis Injection
LanguageData.MSInjector_Unit.label: Injector Unit
LanguageData.MSInjector_Unit.description: A base mechanite ready injector unit. Combine with mechanite chemicals for use.
LanguageData.MSMetasis.label: Metasis Injection
LanguageData.MSMetasis.description: Refined from Luciferium this modified concoction of mechanites improve the body's functioning in all respects. Removes the addiction properties of Luciferium as part of the refining process but also removes some of the other benefits. Taken every 7 days.
